Detailed Description

Base class for both types of referee. Handles sending ROS messages to the relevant channels (when necessary).

There are four main topic types published by this module:

  • GameState: contains information relevant to how the game should currently be played (playing/halt/ready/stop, restart, etc).
  • TeamInfo (ours and theirs): team names, scores, and card information.
  • TeamColor: our team color.
  • Goalie: which robot is currently used as our goalie.

All topics are latched using transient_local() with depth 1.

Member Function Documentation

◆ set_play_state()

void referee::RefereeBase::set_play_state ( const PlayState &  state)
inlineprotected

Handle a state transition. This should be called whenever we get a new command including state, restart, or ball placement.

!! This should not be called repeatedly for the same command !!

This is always the play state for the YELLOW team (i.e. yellow restarts correspond to OURS)
